title: Next.js 14 Documentation - App Router
content: Referenced Next.js 14 App Router documentation for implementing the website structure, layouts, and routing. The App Router provides better performance and developer experience compared to the Pages Router.

title: Next.js Metadata API
content: Used Next.js Metadata API for SEO optimization including meta tags, Open Graph, and Twitter Cards. This provides type-safe metadata configuration with excellent SEO defaults.

title: i18next Documentation
content: Referenced i18next documentation for internationalization setup, following the same patterns used in the main nextai translator product for consistency.

title: react-i18next Hooks
content: Used react-i18next hooks (useTranslation) for accessing translations in React components, enabling dynamic language switching without page reloads.

title: GitHub REST API Documentation
content: Integrated GitHub REST API to fetch repository information (stars, forks) and latest release data for social proof and download links.

title: Tailwind CSS Documentation
content: Used Tailwind CSS utility classes for styling components with responsive design, custom colors, and animations. Configured custom theme in tailwind.config.ts.

title: WCAG 2.1 AA Guidelines
content: Implemented accessibility features following WCAG 2.1 AA standards including semantic HTML, ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, color contrast requirements, and skip navigation link.

title: MDN Web Docs - User-Agent
content: Referenced MDN documentation for user-agent parsing to implement platform and browser detection for download recommendations.

title: Vitest Documentation
content: Set up Vitest for unit testing with React Testing Library integration for component tests.

title: Playwright Documentation
content: Configured Playwright for end-to-end testing across multiple browsers and devices, including mobile viewports.

title: Google Analytics 4 Event Tracking
content: Implemented Google Analytics 4 event tracking for conversion monitoring (downloads, CTA clicks, language changes) with custom parameters.

title: Schema.org Structured Data
content: Referenced Schema.org documentation for implementing structured data (Organization, WebSite, SoftwareApplication schemas) to enhance search engine understanding and rich snippets.

title: Open Graph Protocol
content: Implemented Open Graph meta tags for optimal social media sharing appearance on Facebook, LinkedIn, and other platforms.

title: Twitter Cards Documentation
content: Configured Twitter Card meta tags for rich previews when the website is shared on Twitter/X.

title: Project Knowledge - nextai translator Overview
content: Referenced project knowledge about nextai translator's features, supported platforms, and AI providers to accurately represent the product on the website.
